messages.TRMSG_PRE_BATTLE:
See how Mt. Coronet towers above us.
I want to be big like that one day!
messages.TRMSG_DEFEAT: You loom before me as a giant presence!
messages.TRMSG_POST_BATTLE:
Mt. Coronet has long been known as
an ancient and mysterious mountain.
